level1.value: Level 1- Small talk less than 30 seconds

level3.value: A: hey how’s it going?
B: good how are you?
A: good
B: alright see you later

level1.value: Level 2- Extended small talk, more than 30 seconds

level3.value: A: Hi.
B: Oh, hi.
A: How are you doing?
B: I'm doing alright. How about you?
A: Not too bad. Wish this rain would let up soon
B: I don’t know, I kinda like it this way.
A: Well I wish I had known this morning so I could’ve brought a jacket.
B: Me too.
A: So where are you going now?
B: I'm going to meet a friend of mine at the book store
A: Going to do a little shopping?
B: Yeah, I have to buy some presents for my parents.
A: What's the occasion?
B: It's their anniversary and they like getting souvenirs.
A: That's great. Well, you better get going. You don't want to be late.
B: I'll see you next time.
A: Sure. Bye.
A: Hey how are you?
B: I’m alright how bout you?
A: I’m good, what’s going on?
B: I just have a lot of tests coming up and I’m working all weekend so I don’t think I’ll have time to study.
A: Oh, that’s a bummer, I’m sure you’ll be fine, good luck
B: Thanks

level1.value: Level 4- Checking up on personal information

level3.value: A: Hey how’s it going?
B: Good and you?
A: Good, how’d your tests go?
B: They went okay, better than I thought but not as good as I wanted
A: Well at least they’re over!
B: Ha ha yeah.
A: Hey.
B: Hey, what’s new?”
A: nothing much how about you?
B: nothing much. I wa thinking of going to see a movie this weekend.
A: Oh yeah, which one?
B: I don’t know yet. You wanto come?
A: yeah that’d be fun. What time?
B: Um, lets look up what movies are showing and see what times they are playing.
A: okay
